data.text:
We’re together in the fight against breast cancer!
Today, we are committed to the world more than ever, and we wear pink to join this cause.
#PinkOctober #PerformTheSelfExam https://t.co/lLv2gcYAhA

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends
domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis such as Monday motivation.

data.text: @OfficialZazaK Hi Zaza, if the travel agency can not process your requirement, they can contact their help desk for further assistance. Thanks.
@ceebuttas You have to manage your request directly with your travel agency. Regards.
@ceebuttas We replied to your DM. Regards.
@ceebuttas Hello, please send us a DM to help you. Regards.
@dsarango Hi, we've sent you a response by DM. Regards.
@V1V1ana_Marcela Hi, your refund is in process and we will notify you once the process has concluded. Regards.
@ceebuttas Hi, you must request the refund directly to your travel agency and if they have inconveniences, they have to get in touch with their help desk. Thanks.
@V1V1ana_Marcela Hello, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@dsarango Hi, we sent you a DM.
@dsarango Hello, we replied via DM.
@dsarango Hello, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@V1V1ana_Marcela Hi, please send us a DM with your booking code. Regards.

@dsarango Hi, through this means we can assist you, in order to do so, please provide via DM the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.
@stbenjam Our flights are subject to variation. Have in mind that you can enter your claim here: https://t.co/DpZ1u0yGCH. Regards.
@stbenjam We verify that we do not have available flights on December 23rd from New York to Guayaquil. Our flights are subject to change and subject to every government restrictions. Regards.
@stbenjam Please, send us your booking code or ticket number and complete name via DM. We will await for your reply. Regards.

@stbenjam Hello, have in mind that our flights are subject to change and subject to every government restrictions. You will be able to verify our flight availability through our website here: https://t.co/XJ1kMIbsFF. Regards.
@lapalss Hola, cuéntanos de que manera podemos ayudarte. Quedamos atentos
@Joemaguina10 Hello, in order to provide your further information please send us via inbox your reservation code or ticket number and complete name. We will await for your reply. Regards.
@Aocastello Hi, please send us a DM with your full name. Also, we recommend you to hide your comment because it contains personal information. Regards.
@mellamoiggy ... Nuestros aviones cuentan con estos filtros que eliminan el 99,9% de partículas del tamaño de bacterias, hongos y virus. Saludos.
@mellamoiggy Hola, de acuerdo con lo establecido por MinSalud y los protocolos de bioseguridad, las aeronaves que cuentan con filtros HEPA no requieren distanciamiento social...

@DanielK61234372 Hello Daniel, in order to provide you further information and help you, please send us via DM your booking code or ticket number and an image of the charge on your credit card. We will await for your reply. Regards.
@JesusA_InfoSec Please, send us the case number they have with us to check it by DM, please.
@JesusA_InfoSec Hi, refunds of all tickets issued by travel agencies have to be requested with them directly. Regards.
@Olander86 Hi, please send us a DM with more details of your request. Regards.
@OfficialZazaK We replied to your DM. Regards.
@Ricardo92734964 Hello, please send us your booking code via DM. Regards.
@BenGoldblatt We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@FueledByYelyah Yes, January 2021. We have flights with connections since October. Regards.
@BenGoldblatt Hi, we can assist you through this means. Please send us your booking code or ticket number and your full name by DM. Regards.
@FueledByYelyah Hi, the direct flight is available since January: https://t.co/TidpC0uKJz. Regards.
@HilaryCheng11 We are here to assist you. Regards.
@HilaryCheng11 We have sent you a DM. Regards.

urls.title: Vuelos Baratos con LATAM Airlines Estados Unidos | Sitio Oficial
urls.description: ¡Aprovecha los increíbles descuentos y ofertas en vuelos que te ofrece LATAM Airlines! Reserva tu viaje ahora y disfruta de la mejor experiencia

data.text: @marycarmenfr Hola, contamos con vuelos desde Los Ángeles a Santiago desde el 04 de octubre. Si deseas cotizar, ingresa aquí: https://t.co/8a2ZXdJ0Jw. Saludos.
@DrRicardoBianco Hi, we understand your discomfort and we are working on your case in order to give you an answer. Regards.
@DrRicardoBianco Hi, we are working on your case and we will send you an answer. Regards.
@GeiseZa We've replied through DM, regards.

@GeiseZa Hi, in order to check the information, please provide via DM, your travel voucher number (if you have one). If not, please indicate the booking code or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.

@JamiePicken Hi, we understand your discomfort. However, the refund process is taking more than usual due to the high number of requests. As soon as you get the money refunded, we'll notify you. Regards.
@moniquenborges Your refund is in process, but you can enter your claim here: https://t.co/aVHag9parM. Regards.

@moniquenborges Hi, the reason for the cancellation of the ticket is due to an involuntary error in the rate generator software that caused an incorrect charge. Your refund will be processed within a period of up to 60 days. Regards.
@Rafadelos Hola, te hemos brindado respuesta vía DM. Gracias por escribirnos. Saludos.
@adamk1188 We sent you a private message. Regards.
@adamk1188 We can only check your request if you send us the previously requested information.
@adamk1188 Hi, send us a private message with your ticket number (13 numbers) or Travel Voucher, and your full name. We'll stay tuned.
@tj_man20 There is not an exact date yet. You can check our availability in our website. Thanks.
@tj_man20 Hi, if you want to quote, click here: https://t.co/PHdMBLvMRY. Don't forget to check the terms and conditions. Regards.
@de_paloan We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@de_paloan Hi, one of your flights is cancelled. Please send us a DM. Regards.

#AttentionPassengers: if you have a trip soon, please check out all the government restrictions of the destination you will visit prior to your flight, since some of them request a negative PCR test or other requirements. More info here: https://t.co/tyTvBMogVv https://t.co/6AURWwDA7n
@DrRicardoBianco We have added your comments into your case, and we will provide you a formal response as soon as possible. Please, wait for our contact. Regards.
@Thestylestash Hello, please send us your booking code or ticket number and complete name via DM in order to provide you a formal response. We will await for your reply. Regards.
@DrRicardoBianco In order to proceed with your request, please answer the message we sent via email yesterday. We will wait for your reply.
@JonathanHarrig6 Hi, your request is in process, we will notify you through your email as soon as your request is completed. Regards.
@MMangual78 We have sent you a DM. Thanks.
@DrRicardoBianco Please send us the information requested so we can continue working on your case. Thanks.
@DrRicardoBianco It is necessary to send that information through your email. Regards.
@DrRicardoBianco We'll be waiting for the information that we requested through your email. Regards.
@rwilliamsdc We sent you a private message. Regards.
@rwilliamsdc Hi, send us a DM with your booking code (6 letters) and full name. We'll stay tuned.

@DrRicardoBianco Hello, according to your request, we have added your comments into your case number 27464801. However, we verify that we have sent you a response via email yesterday, we suggest you to check it. You can verify the status of your case here: https://t.co/wrmXISk3II. Regards.

@fredcfreitas1 Hello, if you are referring to your Travel Voucher numbers, we verify that they are on refund process and as soon as they get confirmed we will contact you. Have in mind that refund process is taking more time than usual due to the high demand on these requests. Regards.
Your questions are answered today in the first chapter of 60 Seconds with María Fernández de Córdoba, our Product and Experience Manager. Join us with our #NewWaysToFly. https://t.co/oSQfbNWQyg
@Maikol32486701 Hola, te hemos enviado un DM. Saludos.
@MMangual78 Hi, please send us a DM with the name of the passenger, booking code or ticket number. Regards.
@stbenjam Hi, please send us through DM your ticket or Travel Voucher number, as well as your full name, to check it. We'll stay tuned.
@wilreynolds Hi, please send us a DM with your case numbers and we will assist you. Regards.
@PB86733349 Hi, we have sent a response through DM. Regards.
@cujabraus We will and we will send you an email with them. Regards.
@cujabraus Hi, we will send you an email when the refund is done. Regards.
@PatrickSugarman Hi Patrick, we will give an update of your case as soon as possible. Please, wait for our contact. Thanks.
@dpaik323 Daniel, we sent you a DM. Thanks.
@dpaik323 Please send us a DM with the travel voucher number that is not right. Regards.
@dpaik323 Hi Daniel, your refund is in process. Please wait for the confirmation. Regards.
@gomesmesgo Hi, send us a DM with your booking code (6 letters), full name, email address, phone number, and ID or passport number (whichever you used during the process). We'll stay tuned.
@ambforevah Hi, we'll get back to you regarding your request through the case 27553757 as soon as possible. Stay tuned. Regards.
@DemLouisa Hola, tu caso está siendo gestionado. Tan pronto tengamos novedades nos contactaremos contigo. Saludos.
@Rafadelos Hola, la transferencia está en proceso. Por favor aguarda el correo de confirmación. Saludos.
@AnSoler2 Hi, we have sent a response through DM. Regards.
@LilianBecar Comprendemos tu molestia. Visualizamos que ya optaste por realizar un cambio en tu itinerario. Quedamos atentos.
@toledofernanda Hi, we have sent a response through DM. Regards.
@RodNYC1 Hi, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@JDSFilms We sent you a DM. Regards.
@JDSFilms Hi, if you need assistance with a reservation, send us the booking code through a DM along with your full name to verify the information. Regards.
@PatrickSugarman We sent you a DM. Regards.
@PatrickSugarman Hi, we sent you a private message. Regards.
@DariusSyrossian Hi, if you need assistance with a refund, please send us a DM with the name of the passenger and ticket number. Regards.
@de_paloan We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@PatrickSugarman We sent you a private message. Regards.
@PatrickSugarman We have sent you a response. Regards.
@PatrickSugarman We have replied to your message via DM. Regards.
@PatrickSugarman We have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@PatrickSugarman Hello, in order to provide you further information about the status of your refund please send us your ticket number via DM. We will await for your reply. Regards.
@kesgyatso Hi, we have answered your request through your Facebook account. Regards.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @GeorgeMo The answer given by email is definitive. Regards.
@GeorgeMo Once it's expired we can't reverse it. The answer provided by email is definitive. Regards.
@GeorgeMo Hi, in the case was stated we can't help you in this opportunity as your travel voucher expired. We hope to be helpful in another occasion. Regards.
@DemLouisa Hola, estamos revisando lo sucedido a través del caso 27350264 y nos comunicaremos contigo para mayor detalle. Saludos
